category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_Rev_Rule_Selected
preference.preference_description: Specifies the revision rule selected by the user in Active Workspace. Make sure this preference is deleted if the first value of "AWC_Rev_Rule_List" preference has to be selected in AWC Client. Add a valid value to this preference if a specific revision rule in the list has to be selected. If the "AWC_Rev_Rule_List" preference is modified to remove the value matching the AWC_Rev_Rule_Selected value, delete this preference."
